featured.text: The new structure will be 200 meters high, 100 meters shorter than the cast-iron Eiffel Tower built 100 years ago.

definition.zh_def: 投擲或拋出物體的動作；也指演員陣容或角色分配。
definition.en_def: To throw something forcefully; also refers to the group of actors in a play or film.
definition.example: She decided to cast her fishing line into the lake.
